G-CRIME SCORE

G-CRIME LEVEL
MAIN PAGE
G-CRIME
GREEN CRIME DETECTOR
Start
Green crime detector is a self-check tool developed to assess green criminology of organisations. This tool aims to offer an indicator of situations involving environmental crime.

This application is to provide a comprehensive self-assessment system on green crime. It also offer a recommendation report that will re-align future environmental practices in accordance with best practices.
The result of the green crime assessment will enable organisations:
1. To determine the level of practices of organisations on environmental related issues.
2. To enhance, align and improve their environmental management and practices
